Whoami?

I am self-taught web craftsman with about 8 years of professional experience.

At the age of 14 I wrote my first lines of HTML, and at the age of 21 I joined a Front-end web development team for the first time.

Since then, I've been part of a few agencies and start-ups, such as Cloud9IDE and Moviepilot.com.

I've also been a contributor to the Chaplin.js and MooTools javascript frameworks.

Languages

Spanish (native), Catalan, English (fluent), German (B1)

Skills overview

Javascript: Node.js, Backbone.js, Chaplin.js, Can.js, Angular.js, D3.js.

Node.js: Express.js, Socket.io, Grunt, Bower.

Ruby: RvM, RoR, Sinatra/Padrino.

TDD/BDD: Buster.js, Sinon.js, QUnit, Jasmine, Karma

SQL and NoSQL: Redis, PostgreSQL, MySQL.

CSS and Supersets: SA(C)SS, LESS, Stylus.

Experience overview

Agile methodologies and Lean development, Open Source contributions and maintenance, Performance optimization, Team leading and Mentoring, Bootstraping.

Amazon Web Services, Unix, Data mining, Data visualization, Web services, Protocols, NGINX, CDN, Heroku (SEMSERVER), Git, Svn, CRO, web/mobile optimization, UX/UI.
